attributes.action: Restrict immigration  & cease all aid donations to Sudan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We request the Prime Minister & the Government to restrict immigration from & curtail aid donations to Sudan whom we the undersigned believe to be provocative in the extreme due to their extraordinary handling of the English  aid teachers unjust imprisonment in that country due to a perceived religious infringement.
The fact that this action by the Sudanese judiciary is so reprehensive to so many of our citizens has left me no other avenue but to create this petition for signature by those who, like myself , wish to register our disapproval directly to the Office of The Prime Minister for his attention & intervention

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
